template.jcr:title: PAN Input
template.name: pan
template.invalidFormatMessage: PAN must be in format ABCDE1234F (5 letters, 4 numbers, 1 letter)
template.invalidLastCharacterMessage: Last character must be a letter

fields.name: fourthCharacter
fields.label: Fourth Character
fields.description: The character that must appear in the 4th position (default: P)

fields.name: placeholder
fields.label: Placeholder
fields.description: Placeholder text shown in the input field

fields.name: invalidFormatMessage
fields.label: Invalid Format Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when PAN format is invalid
fields.default: PAN must be in format ABCDE1234F (5 letters, 4 numbers, 1 letter)

fields.name: invalidFourthCharacterMessage
fields.label: Invalid Fourth Character Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when 4th character is invalid

fields.name: invalidFirstFiveMessage
fields.label: Invalid First Five Characters Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when first 5 characters are not letters

fields.name: invalidMiddleFourMessage
fields.label: Invalid Middle Four Characters Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when characters 6-9 are not numbers

fields.name: invalidLastCharacterMessage
fields.label: Invalid Last Character Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when last character is not a letter
fields.default: Last character must be a letter

fields.name: lengthErrorMessage
fields.label: Length Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when PAN length is not 10 characters
fields.default: PAN must be exactly 10 characters long
